Class ReservationMgr

  • java.lang.Object
    • ReservationMgr
  • public class ReservationMgr
extends Object
    Manages the Reservations made in the Restaurant A restaruant has multipls tables which can have multiple reservations

    2021-11-12
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    SamarthAgarwal

    • Method Detail

      • createReservation

        public void createReservation​(Restaurant restaurant,
                              String custName,
                              int pax,
                              int contact,
                              Date reservedDate,
                              Date reservedTime)
        Creates a reservation and adds it to the first available table. pax should be smaller than or equal to table capacity if a table has reservations, it is only available if the new reservation is atleast 2 hours after the previous reservations
        Parameters:
        restaurant - The restaurant object being used with the tables instantiated
        custName - The customer name for whom the reservation is being made
        pax - number of people in the party
        contact - The contact of the customer
        reservedDate - the date at which the table will be occupied
        reservedTime - the time at which the table will be occupied

      • showReservation

        public void showReservation​(Restaurant restaurant,
                            String custName)
        Shows the reservation made by the customer
        Parameters:
        restaurant - The restaurant object being used with the tables instantiated
        custName - The customer name for whom the reservation is being shown

      • removeReservation

        public void removeReservation​(Restaurant restaurant,
                              String custName)
        Removes the reservation made by the customer
        Parameters:
        restaurant - The restaurant object being used with the tables instantiated
        custName - The customer name for whom the reservation is being removed

      • showTableAvailability

        public void showTableAvailability​(Restaurant restaurant)
        Shows the tables and the reservations, if any, at that table two hours from current time
        Parameters:
        restaurant - The restaurant object being used with the tables instantiated
